title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi! The Sky Ring is a vertical tower ride that gives you a breathtaking panoramic view before a thrilling drop.

title: Mission Interstellar
description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride! Mission Interstellar is a next-gen space-themed flying theater experience with immersive visuals and motion.

title: Giant Wheel
description: Enjoy a panoramic view of the entire park from the top of the Giant Wheel, one of the tallest in India. A must-try for families and thrill-seekers alike.

title: Wonderla Bamba
description: Perfect for first time thrill-seekers: a spin with sudden drops and bursts of speed! Wonderla Bamba is a family-friendly ride with fun twists and turns.

title: Space Gun
description: See the world upside-down, dangling from high up above the ground! Space Gun is a high-adrenaline ride that swings and flips you 360 degrees.

title: Recoil
description: India's first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride! Experience the thrill of being launched both forwards and backwards at high speed.

title: Hyperdeck
description: Get transported to another world as you soar through a breathtaking 3D metaverse! Hyperdeck is a VR-based immersive gaming and ride experience.

title: Equinox
description: A thrill monster that flips you around 360 degrees in a gravity-defying spin. Equinox is a pendulum ride that swings and rotates for maximum excitement.

title: Air Race
description: An exhilarating flight simulation with banks, loops and dives. Air Race lets you experience the thrill of aerobatic flying in a safe, fun way.

title: Y-Scream
description: Strap in tight to swing, spin and scream on this dizzying 360-degree thrill fest! Y-Scream is a high-speed pendulum ride that will leave you breathless.

title: Wave Pool
description: Experience the bliss of waves washing over you, far away from the sea. The Wave Pool simulates ocean waves for a fun and relaxing time.

title: Drop Loop
description: Slide down a sky-high slope, twist through a loop and make a splashy exit! Drop Loop is a high-thrill water slide with a vertical drop and a full loop.

title: Rain Disco
description: Get soaked, splashed and sprayed in this thrilling pool paradise! Rain Disco is a rain dance floor with music and lights for endless fun.

title: Fun Rapids
description: Rush down, take a breather, and slide back down to the finish for pure, non-stop thrill! Fun Rapids is a multi-lane water slide for racing your friends.

title: Magic Carousel
description: Classic fun for all ages, the magic carousel spins you in a whirl of colors! Enjoy a gentle ride on beautifully crafted horses and carriages.
